name: The Princess is Busy!
description:
"The Princess is Busy!" is a 3D turn-based RPG stand-alone adventure game.
Multi-Language.
Princess Nancy stay in the palace every day, one day she would like to go out to see the outside world. Despite the strong opposition from the king, the princess finally found a way out of the palace.
The princess came to a village threatened by monsters, who ate a child in the village every year. Although the princess was a girl, the fire of justice was burning in her heart. Help this poor village! Pick up the weapon in your hand to destroy the monster!
After killing the monster, the princess entered the world map and started a new adventure...
